alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Northern Valley; Richland; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:11AM MST until January 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon MST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Northern Valley; Richland; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux
